summary: This document appears to be a due diligence report prepared by Deepanshu Sharma, a research analyst, regarding a subject's name search in compliance with AML standards. It outlines the procedures for reviewing search results and emphasizes the need for escalation in case of significant negative media results or accounts involving politically exposed persons (PEPs).

persons.name: Deepanshu Sharma
persons.context: Deepanshu Sharma prepared the due diligence report and conducted the name searches as part of compliance procedures.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report related to AML compliance.
It was prepared by Deepanshu Sharma on September 11, 2018.
The report emphasizes the need for escalation of significant negative media results.
It mentions the requirement to perform additional searches on each subject.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
